il_representations.il package¶

Submodules¶

il_representations.il.bc module¶

BC implementation that makes it easy to use auxiliary losses.

class il_representations.il.bc.BC(*, policy, l2_weight, ent_weight)¶

Bases: object

Bare-bones BC implementation without outer loop etc.

Adapted from imitation’s bc.py.

all_trainable_params()¶

Trainable parameters for BC (only includes policy parameters).

batch_forward(obs_acts)¶

Do a forward pass of the network, given a set of observations and actions.

make_data_iter(il_dataset, augmentation_fn, batch_size, n_batches, shuffle_buffer_size)¶

il_representations.il.bc_support module¶

Support code for using imitation’s BC implementation.

class il_representations.il.bc_support.BCModelSaver(policy, save_dir, save_interval_batches, start_nupdate=0)¶

Bases: object

Callback that saves BC policy every N epochs.

save(batch_num)¶

Save policy.

il_representations.il.disc_rew_nets module¶

Custom discriminator/reward networks for imitation.

class il_representations.il.disc_rew_nets.ImageDiscrimNet(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: torch.nn.

Image-based discriminator network. This is intended to be passed as a discrim_net argument to DiscrimNetGAIL in imitation.rewards.discrim_net.

forward(observation, action, traj_info=None)¶
class il_representations.il.disc_rew_nets.ImageRewardNet(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: imitation.rewards.reward_nets.

Reward net for AIRL that wraps ImageDiscrimNet (which basically does the thing we want anyway).

property base_reward_net¶
reward_train(state, action, next_state, done)¶

il_representations.il.gail_pol_save module¶

class il_representations.il.gail_pol_save.GAILSavePolicyCallback(ppo_algo, save_every_n_steps, save_dir, *, save_template='policy_{timesteps:08d}_steps.pt')¶

Bases: object

This callback can be passed to AdversarialTrainer.train() to save a policy snapshot every save_every_n_steps time steps.

il_representations.il.ppo_gail module¶

WIP PPO + GAIL implementation that makes it easy to use auxiliary losses. Forked from Ilya Kostrikov’s implementation on Github:

https://github.com/ikostrikov/pytorch-a2c-ppo-acktr-gail/blob/master/a2c_ppo_acktr/algo/ppo.py

As of 2021-05-19 this is not yet finished (will probably work on it once I have BC results).

class il_representations.il.ppo_gail.PPO(actor_critic, clip_param, ppo_epoch, num_mini_batch, value_loss_coef, entropy_coef, lr=None, eps=None, max_grad_norm=None, use_clipped_value_loss=True)¶

Bases: object

batch_forward(sample)¶
update(rollouts)¶

il_representations.il.score_logging module¶

SB3 score-logging callback for MAGICAL (but should be safe to add to include when using any environment—if the desired eval_score key is not in infos, then it won’t add any log entries).

class il_representations.il.score_logging.SB3ScoreLoggingCallback(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: stable_baselines3.common.callbacks.

Callback for SB3 RL algorithms which extracts the ‘eval_score’ from the step info dict (if it exists) and includes it in the logs. Useful for MAGICAL, which reports end-of-trajectory performance using eval_score.

Tested for PPO, but may work for other algorithms too.

il_representations.il.utils module¶

Utilities that are helpful for several pieces of IL code (e.g. in both il_train.py and joint_training.py).

il_representations.il.utils.add_infos(data_iter)¶

Add a dummy ‘infos’ value to each dict in a data stream.

il_representations.il.utils.streaming_extract_keys(*keys_to_keep)¶

Filter a generator of dicts to keep only the specified keys.
